text:
This year, we must realised a project in agronomy on the bean in order to derminate ascochyta's impact on this plants. We must calculated the leaf area before and after instalation of the desease. We have calculated the agressevity and incidence of this desease to have informations on its propagation in th agricultural system. That's why, we have done the mesures in the laboratory and in the field. In the laboratory, we have inoculated our bean plants to calculated leaf area, the lenght of the leaves. Moreover, we have realised a dissection of the apex in order to see the leaves numbers and to see the progression of this desease. Indeed, Ascochyta make necrosis on the leaf. So, the development of our plants can be affected and to stop. We have studied the seed of the CIPAN for evaluate its effects on the bean plants beacause this seed was present in the last year on the field.
 In this study, we have proposed a perfect protocol who we have permit to say what ascochyta could reduce the leaf area and the numbers of the leaves on the bean plants. We have see what ascochyta have been very fast, it has destroyed our plants in few days. On the field, the bean plants was attacked by bioagressor and our experiences have been really bad. To conclude, this experience has been very beneficial to my future life because the technical work and the reflexion are principals goals that director of my futur job wait. I learned to do correctly scientifical step and scientifical statistics.
